00007 package PGML;

00009 sub show {
00010   ClearWarnings;
00011   my $parser = PGML::Parse->new(shift);
00012   warn join("\n","==================","Errors parsing PGML:",@warnings,"==================\n") if scalar(@warnings);
00013   return $parser->{root}->show;
00014 }
00015 
00016 our @warnings = ();
00017 our $warningsFatal = 0;
00018 sub Warning {
00019   my $warning = join("",@_);
00020   $warning =~ s/ at line \d+ of \(eval \d+\)//;
00021   $warning =~ s/ at \(eval \d+\) line \d+//;
00022   $warning =~ s/, at EOF$//;
00023   die $warning if $warningsFatal;
00024   push @warnings,$warning;
00025 }
00026 sub ClearWarnings {@warnings = ()};
00027 
00028 sub Eval {main::PG_restricted_eval(@_)}
00029 
00030 sub Sort {return main::lex_sort(@_)}

00034 package PGML::Parse;
00035 
00036 my $wordStart = qr/[^a-z0-9]/;
00037 
00038 my $indent = '^\t+';
00039 my $lineend = '\n+';
00040 my $linebreak = '   ?(?=\n)';
00041 my $heading = '#+';
00042 my $rule = '(?:---+|===+)';
00043 my $list = '(?:^|(?<=[\t ]))(?:[-+o*]|(?:\d|[ivx]+|[IVX]+|[a-zA-Z])[.)]) +';
00044 my $align = '>> *| *<<';
00045 my $pre = ':   ';
00046 my $emphasis = '\*+|_+';
00047 my $chars = '\\\\.|[{}[\]\'"]';
00048 my $ansrule = '\[(?:_+|[ox^])\]\*?';
00049 my $open = '\[(?:[!<%@$]|::?|``?|\|+ ?)';
00050 my $close = '(?:[!>%@$]|::?|``?| ?\|+)\]';
00051 my $noop = '\[\]';
00052 
00053 my $splitPattern =
00054   qr/($indent|$open|$ansrule|$close|$linebreak|$lineend|$heading|$rule|$list|$align|$pre|$emphasis|$noop|$chars)/m;
00055 
00056 my %BlockDefs;
00057 
00058 sub new {
00059   my $self = shift; my $class = ref($self) || $self;
00060   my $string = shift;
00061   my $parser = bless {
00062     string => $string,
00063     indent => 0, actualIndent => 0,
00064     atLineStart => 1, atBlockStart => 1
00065   }, $class;
00066   $parser->Parse($parser->Split($string));
00067   return $parser;
00068 }
00069 
00070 sub Split {
00071   my $self = shift; my $string = shift;
00072   $string =~ s/\t/    /g;                             # turn tabs into spaces
00073   $string =~ s!^((?:    )+)!"\t"x(length($1)/4)!gme;  # make initial indent into tabs
00074   $string =~ s!^(?:\t* +|\t+ *)$!!gm;                 # make blank lines blank
00075   return split($splitPattern,$string);
00076 }
00077 
00078 sub Error {
00079   my $self = shift; my $message = shift;
00080   my $name = $self->{block}{token}; $name =~ s/^\s+|\s+$//g;
00081   $message = sprintf($message,$name);
00082   PGML::Warning $message;
00083 }
00084 
00085 sub Unwind {
00086   my $self = shift;;
00087   my $block = $self->{block}; $self->{block} = $block->{prev};
00088   $self->{block}->popItem;
00089   $self->Text($block->{token});
00090   $self->{block}->pushItem(@{$block->{stack}});
00091   $self->Text($block->{terminator}) if $block->{terminator} && ref($block->{terminator}) ne 'Regexp';
00092   $self->{atBlockStart} = 0;
00093 }
00094 
00095 sub blockError {
00096   my $self = shift; my $message = shift;
00097   $self->Error($message);
00098   $self->Unwind;
00099 }
00100 
00101 sub isLineEnd {
00102   my $self = shift; my $block = shift;
00103   $block = $block->{prev}; my $i = $self->{i};
00104   while ($i < scalar(@{$self->{split}})) {
00105     return 0 unless $self->{split}[$i++] eq '';
00106     my $token = $self->{split}[$i++];
00107     last if $token =~ m/^\n+$/;
00108     next if $token =~ m/^   ?$/;
00109     return 0 unless $token =~ m/^ +<<$/ && $block->{align};
00110     $block = $block->{prev};
00111   }
00112   return 1;
00113 }
00114 
00115 sub nextChar {
00116   my $self = shift; my $default = shift; $default = '' unless defined $default;
00117   return substr(($self->{split}[$self->{i}] || $self->{split}[$self->{i}+1] || $default),0,1);
00118 }
00119 
00120 sub prevChar {
00121   my $self = shift; my $default = shift; $default = '' unless defined $default;
00122   my $i2 = $self->{i}-2; $i2 = 0 if $i2 < 0;
00123   my $i3 = $self->{i}-3; $i3 = 0 if $i3 < 0;
00124   return substr(($self->{split}[$i2] || $self->{split}[$i3] || $default),-1,1);
00125 }
00126 
00127 sub Parse {
00128   my $self = shift; my $block;
00129   $self->{split} = [@_]; $self->{i} = 0;
00130   $self->{block} = $self->{root} = PGML::Root->new($self);
00131   while ($self->{i} < scalar(@{$self->{split}})) {
00132     $block = $self->{block};
00133     $self->Text($self->{split}[($self->{i})++]);
00134     my $token = $self->{split}[($self->{i})++]; next unless defined $token && $token ne '';
00135     for ($token) {
00136       $block->{terminator} && /^$block->{terminator}\z/                    && do {$self->Terminate($token); last};
00137       /^\[[@\$]/  && ($block->{parseAll} || $block->{parseSubstitutions})  && do {$self->Begin($token); last};
00138       /^\[%/      && ($block->{parseAll} || $block->{parseComments})       && do {$self->Begin($token); last};
00139       /^\\./      && ($block->{parseAll} || $block->{parseSlashes})        && do {$self->Slash($token); last};
00140       /^\n\z/     && do {$self->Break($token); last};
00141       /^\n\n+\z/  && do {$self->Par($token); last};
00142       /^\*\*?$/   && (!$block->{parseAll} && $block->{parseSubstitutions}) && do {$self->Star($token); last};
00143       $block->{balance} && /^$block->{balance}/ && do {$self->Begin($token,substr($token,0,1)); last};
00144       $block->{balance} && /$block->{balance}$/ && do {$self->Begin($token,substr($token,-1,1)); last};
00145       $block->{parseAll} && do {$self->All($token); last};
00146       /^[\}\]]\z/ && do {$self->Unbalanced($token); last};
00147       $self->Text($token);
00148     }
00149   }
00150   $self->End("END_PGML");
00151   delete $self->{root}{parser};
00152 }
00153 
00154 sub All {
00155   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00156   return $self->Begin($token) if substr($token,0,1) eq "[" && $BlockDefs{$token};
00157   for ($token) {
00158     /\t/          && do {return $self->Indent($token)};
00159     /\d+\. /      && do {return $self->Bullet($token,"numeric")};
00160     /[ivx]+[.)] / && do {return $self->Bullet($token,"roman")};
00161     /[a-z][.)] /  && do {return $self->Bullet($token,"alpha")};
00162     /[IVX]+[.)] / && do {return $self->Bullet($token,"Roman")};
00163     /[A-Z][.)] /  && do {return $self->Bullet($token,"Alpha")};
00164     /[-+o*] /     && do {return $self->Bullet($token,"bullet")};
00165     /\{/          && do {return $self->Brace($token)};
00166     /\[]/         && do {return $self->NOOP($token)};
00167     /\[\|/        && do {return $self->Verbatim($token)};
00168     /\[./         && do {return $self->Answer($token)};
00169     /_/           && do {return $self->Emphasis($token)};
00170     /\*/          && do {return $self->Star($token)};
00171     /[\"\']/      && do {return $self->Quote($token)};
00172     /^   ?$/      && do {return $self->ForceBreak($token)};
00173     /#/           && do {return $self->Heading($token)};
00174     /-|=/         && do {return $self->Rule($token)};
00175     /<</          && do {return $self->Center($token)};
00176     />>/          && do {return $self->Align($token)};
00177     /:   /        && do {return $self->Preformatted($token)};
00178     $self->Text($token);
00179   }
00180 }
00181 
00182 sub Begin {
00183   my $self = shift; my $token = shift; my $id = shift || $token;
00184   my $options = shift || {};
00185   my $def = {%{$BlockDefs{$id}},%$options, token => $token};
00186   my $type = $def->{type}; delete $def->{type};
00187   my $block = PGML::Block->new($type,$def);
00188   $self->{block}->pushItem($block); $block->{prev} = $self->{block};
00189   $self->{block} = $block;
00190   $self->{atLineStart} = 0; $self->{atBlockStart} = 1;
00191 }
00192 
00193 sub End {
00194   my $self = shift; my $action = shift || "paragraph ends"; my $endAt = shift;
00195   my $block = $self->{block};
00196   $block->popItem if $block->topItem->{type} eq 'break' && $block->{type} ne 'align';
00197   while ($block->{type} ne 'root') {
00198     if (ref($block->{terminator}) eq 'Regexp' || $block->{cancelPar}) {
00199       $self->blockError("'%s' was not closed before $action");
00200     } else {
00201       $self->Terminate;
00202     }
00203     return if $endAt && $endAt == $block;
00204     $block = $self->{block};
00205   }
00206 }
00207 
00208 sub Terminate {
00209   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00210   my $block = $self->{block}; my $prev = $block->{prev};
00211   if (defined($token)) {
00212     $block->{terminator} = $token;
00213     my $method = $block->{terminateMethod};
00214     $self->$method($token) if defined $method;
00215   }
00216   foreach my $field ("prev","parseComments","parseSubstitutions","parseSlashes",
00217                      "parseAll","cancelUnbalanced","cancelNL","cancelPar","balance",
00218              "terminateMethod","noIndent") {delete $block->{$field}}
00219   $self->{block} = $prev;
00220   if ($block->{stack}) {
00221     if (scalar(@{$block->{stack}}) == 0) {$prev->popItem}
00222     elsif ($block->{combine}) {$prev->combineTopItems}
00223   }
00224 }
00225 
00226 sub Unbalanced {
00227   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00228   $self->blockError("parenthesis mismatch: %s terminated by $token") if $self->{block}{cancelUnbalanced};
00229   $self->Text($token);
00230 }
00231 
00232 sub Text {
00233   my $self = shift; my $text = shift; my $force = shift;
00234   if ($text ne "" || $force) {
00235     $self->{block}->pushText($text,$force);
00236     $self->{atLineStart} = $self->{atBlockStart} = $self->{ignoreNL} = 0;
00237   }
00238 }
00239 
00240 sub Item {
00241   my $self = shift; my $type = shift; my $token = shift;
00242   my $def = {%{shift || {}}, token => $token};
00243   $self->{block}->pushItem(PGML::Item->new($type,$def));
00244   $self->{atBlockStart} = 0;
00245 }
00246 
00247 
00248 sub Break {
00249   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00250   if ($self->{ignoreNL}) {
00251     $self->{ignoreNL} = 0;
00252   } else {
00253     $self->blockError("%s was not closed before line break") while $self->{block}{cancelNL};
00254     my $top = $self->{block}->topItem;
00255     if ($top->{breakInside}) {$top->pushText($token)} else {$self->Text($token)}
00256     $self->{ignoreNL} = 1;
00257   }
00258   $self->{atLineStart} = 1;
00259   $self->{actualIndent} = 0;
00260 }
00261 
00262 sub ForceBreak {
00263   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00264   $self->blockError("%s was not closed before forced break") while $self->{block}{cancelNL};
00265   if ($token eq '   ') {
00266     $self->End("forced break");
00267     $self->Item("forced",$token,{noIndent => 1});
00268     $self->{indent} = 0;
00269   } else {
00270     my $top = $self->{block}->topItem;
00271     if ($top->{breakInside}) {$top->pushItem(PGML::Item->new("break",{token=>$token}))}
00272     else {$self->Item("break",$token,{noIndent => 1})}
00273   }
00274   $self->{atLineStart} = $self->{ignoreNL} = 1;
00275   $self->{actualIndent} = 0;
00276 }
00277 
00278 sub Par {
00279   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00280   $self->End;
00281   $self->Item("par",$token,{noIndent => 1});
00282   $self->{atLineStart} = $self->{ignoreNL} = 1;
00283   $self->{indent} = $self->{actualIndent} = 0;
00284 }
00285 
00286 sub Indent {
00287   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00288   if ($self->{atLineStart}) {
00289     my $indent = $self->{actualIndent} = length($token);
00290     if ($indent != $self->{indent}) {
00291       $self->End("indentation change");
00292       $self->{indent} = $indent;
00293     }
00294   } else {
00295     $self->Text($token);
00296   }
00297 }
00298 
00299 sub Slash {
00300   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00301   $self->Text(substr($token,1));
00302 }
00303 
00304 sub Brace {
00305   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00306   my $top = $self->{block}->topItem;
00307   if ($top->{options}) {$self->Begin($token,' {')} else {$self->Text($token)}
00308 }
00309 
00310 sub Verbatim {
00311   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00312   my $bars = $token; $bars =~ s/[^|]//g;
00313   my $bars = "\\".join("\\",split('',$bars));
00314   $self->Begin($token,' [|',{terminator => qr/ ?$bars\]/});
00315 }
00316 
00317 sub Answer {
00318   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00319   my $def = {options => ["answer","width","name","array"]};
00320   $def->{hasStar} = 1 if $token =~ m/\*$/;
00321   $self->Item("answer",$token,$def);
00322 }
00323 
00324 sub Emphasis {
00325   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00326   my $type = $BlockDefs{substr($token,0,1)}->{type};
00327   my $block = $self->{block};
00328   return $self->Terminate if $block->{type} eq $type;
00329   while ($block->{type} ne 'root') {
00330     if ($block->{prev}{type} eq $type) {
00331       $self->End("end of $type",$block);
00332       $self->Terminate();
00333       return;
00334     }
00335     $block = $block->{prev};
00336   }
00337   if ($self->nextChar(' ') !~ m/\s/ && $self->prevChar(' ') !~ m/[a-z0-9]/)
00338     {$self->Begin($token,substr($token,0,1))} else {$self->Text($token)}
00339 }
00340 
00341 sub Star {
00342   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00343   return if $self->StarOption($token);
00344   if ($self->{block}{parseAll}) {$self->Emphasis($token)} else {$self->Text($token)}
00345 }
00346 
00347 sub Rule {
00348   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00349   if ($self->{atLineStart}) {
00350 ### check for line end or braces
00351     $self->Item("rule",$token,{options => ["width","size"]});
00352     $self->{ignoreNL} = 1;
00353   } else {
00354     $self->Text($token);
00355   }
00356 }
00357 
00358 sub Bullet {
00359   my $self = shift; my $token = shift; my $bullet = shift;
00360   return $self->Text($token) unless $self->{atLineStart};
00361   $bullet = {'*'=>'bullet', '+'=>'square', 'o'=>'circle', '-'=>'bullet'}->{substr($token,0,1)} if $bullet eq 'bullet';
00362   my $block = $self->{block};
00363   if ($block->{type} ne 'root' && !$block->{align}) {
00364     while ($block->{type} ne 'root' && !$block->{prev}{align}) {$block = $block->{prev}}
00365     $self->End("start of list item",$block);
00366   }
00367   $self->{indent} = $self->{actualIndent};
00368   $self->Begin("","list",{bullet => $bullet});
00369   $self->Begin($token,"bullet");
00370 }
00371 
00372 sub Heading {
00373   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00374   my $n = length($token);
00375   return $self->Text($token) if $n > 6;
00376   my $block = $self->{block};
00377   if ($self->{atLineStart}) {
00378     if ($block->{type} ne 'root' && $block->{type} ne 'align') {
00379       while ($block->{type} ne 'root' && $block->{prev}{type} ne 'align') {$block = $block->{prev}}
00380       $self->End("start of heading",$block);
00381     }
00382     $self->Begin($token,"#",{n => $n});
00383   } else {
00384     while ($block->{type} ne 'heading' || $block->{n} != $n) {
00385       return $self->Text($token) if $block->{type} eq 'root';
00386       $block = $block->{prev};
00387     }
00388     if ($self->isLineEnd($block)) {
00389       $self->End("end of heading",$block);
00390       $block->{terminator} = $token;
00391       $self->{indent} = 0;
00392     } else {$self->Text($token)}
00393   }
00394 }
00395 
00396 sub Center {
00397   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00398   my $block = $self->{block};
00399   while (!$block->{align} || $block->{align} ne 'right') {
00400     return $self->Text($token) if $block->{type} eq 'root';
00401     $block = $block->{prev};
00402 }
00403   if ($self->isLineEnd($block)) {
00404     $block->{align} = 'center';
00405     $block->{terminator} = $token;
00406     $self->End("end of centering",$block);
00407   } else {$self->Text($token)}
00408 }
00409 
00410 sub Align {
00411   my $self = shift;  my $token = shift;
00412   return $self->Text($token) if !$self->{atLineStart} ||
00413     ($self->{block}{type} eq 'align' && $self->{atBlockStart});
00414   $self->End("start of aligned text");
00415   $self->{indent} = $self->{actualIndent};
00416   $self->Begin($token,">>");
00417   $self->{atLineStart} = $self->{ignoreNL} = 1;
00418 }
00419 
00420 sub Preformatted {
00421   my $self = shift;  my $token = shift; my $action = shift; my $id = shift || $token;
00422   return $self->Text($token) if !$self->{atLineStart} ||
00423     ($self->{block}{type} eq 'align' && $self->{atBlockStart});
00424   $self->End("start of preformatted text");
00425   $self->{indent} = $self->{actualIndent};
00426   $self->Begin($token,':   ');
00427 }
00428 
00429 sub Quote {
00430   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00431   $self->Item("quote",$token);
00432 }
00433 
00434 sub NOOP {
00435   my $self = shift;
00436   $self->Text("",1);
00437 }

00443 %BlockDefs = (
00444   "[:"   => {type=>'math', parseComments=>1, parseSubstitutions=>1,
00445                terminator=>qr/:\]/, terminateMethod=>'terminateGetString',
00446            parsed=>1, allowStar=>1, options=>["context","reduced"]},
00447   "[::"  => {type=>'math', parseComments=>1, parseSubstitutions=>1,
00448                terminator=>qr/::\]/, terminateMethod=>'terminateGetString',
00449            parsed=>1, allowStar=>1, display=>1, options=>["context","reduced"]},
00450   "[`"   => {type=>'math', parseComments=>1, parseSubstitutions=>1,
00451                terminator=>qr/\`\]/, terminateMethod=>'terminateGetString',},
00452   "[``"  => {type=>'math', parseComments=>1, parseSubstitutions=>1,
00453                terminator=>qr/\`\`\]/, terminateMethod=>'terminateGetString', display=>1},
00454   "[!"   => {type=>'image', parseComments=>1, parseSubstitutions=>1,
00455                terminator=>qr/!\]/, terminateMethod=>'terminateGetString',
00456                cancelNL=>1, options=>["title"]},
00457   "[<"   => {type=>'link', parseComments=>1, parseSubstitutions=>1,
00458                terminator=>qr/>\]/, terminateMethod=>'terminateGetString',
00459                cancelNL=>1, options=>["text","title"]},
00460   "[%"   => {type=>'comment', parseComments=>1, terminator=>qr/%\]/},
00461   "[\@"  => {type=>'command', parseComments=>1, parseSubstitutions=>1,
00462                terminator=>qr/@\]/, terminateMethod=>'terminateGetString',
00463                balance=>qr/[\'\"]/, allowStar=>1, allowDblStar=>1},
00464   "[\$"  => {type=>'variable', parseComments=>1, parseSubstitutions=>1,
00465                terminator=>qr/\$?\]/, terminateMethod=>'terminateGetString',
00466            balance=>$balanceAll, cancelUnbalanced=>1, cancelNL=>1, allowStar=>1, allowDblStar=>1},
00467   ' [|'  => {type=>'verbatim', cancelNL=>1, allowStar=>1, terminateMethod=>'terminateGetString'},
00468   " {"   => {type=>'options', parseComments=>1, parseSubstitutions=>1, terminator=>qr/\}/,
00469            balance=>$balanceAll, cancelUnbalanced=>1, terminateMethod => 'terminateOptions'},
00470   "{"    => {type=>'balance', parseComments=>1, parseSubstitutions=>1, terminator=>qr/\}/,
00471            balance=>$balanceAll, cancelUnbalanced=>1},
00472   "["    => {type=>'balance', parseComments=>1, parseSubstitutions=>1, terminator=>qr/\]/,
00473            balance=>$balanceAll, cancelUnbalanced=>1},
00474   "'"    => {type=>'balance', terminator=>qr/\'/, terminateMethod=>'terminateBalance'},
00475   '"'    => {type=>'balance', terminator=>qr/\"/, terminateMethod=>'terminateBalance'},
00476   ":   " => {type=>'pre', parseAll=>1, terminator=>qr/\n+/, terminateMethod=>'terminatePre',
00477                combine=>{pre=>"type"}, noIndent=>-1},
00478   ">>"   => {type=>'align', parseAll=>1, align=>"right", breakInside=>1,
00479            combine=>{align=>"align",par=>1}, noIndent=>-1},
00480   "#"    => {type=>'heading', parseAll=>1, breakInside=>1, combine=>{heading=>"n"}},
00481   "*"    => {type=>'bold', parseAll=>1, cancelPar=>1},
00482   "_"    => {type=>'italic', parseAll=>1, cancelPar=>1},
00483   "bullet" => {type=>'bullet', parseAll=>1},
00484   "list" => {type=>'list', parseAll=>1, combine=>{list=>"bullet",par=>1}, noIndent=>-1},
00485 );

00489 sub terminateGetString {
00490   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00491   my $block = $self->{block};
00492   $block->{text} = $self->stackString;
00493   delete $block->{stack};
00494 }
00495 
00496 sub terminateBalance {
00497   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00498   my $block = $self->{block}; my $stackString = $self->stackString;
00499   $self->{block} = $block->{prev}; $self->{block}->popItem;
00500   if ($block->{token} eq '"' || $block->{token} eq "'") {
00501     $self->Item("quote",$block->{token});
00502     $self->Text($stackString);
00503     $self->Item("quote",$block->{terminator});
00504   } else {
00505     $self->Text($block->{token}.$stackString.$block->{terminator});
00506   }
00507 }
00508 
00509 sub terminatePre {
00510   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00511   $self->{block}{terminator} = ''; # we add the ending token to the text below
00512   if ($token =~ m/\n\n/) {
00513     $self->{block} = $self->{block}{prev};
00514     $self->Par($token);
00515   } else {
00516     $self->Text($token);
00517     $self->{atLineStart} = 1;
00518     $self->{actualIndent} = 0;
00519 }
00520 }
00521 
00522 sub terminateOptions {
00523   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00524   my $options = $self->stackString;
00525   $self->{block} = $self->{block}{prev}; $self->{block}->popItem;
00526   $block = $self->{block}->topItem;
00527   if ($options =~ m/^[a-z_][a-z0-9_]*=>/i) {
00528     my %allowed = (map {$_ => 1} (@{$block->{options}}));
00529     my ($options,$error) = PGML::Eval("{$options}");
00530     $options={},PGML::Warning "Error evaluating options: $error" if $error;
00531     foreach my $option (keys %{$options}) {
00532       if ($allowed{$option}) {$block->{$option} = $options->{$option}}
00533         else {PGML::Warning "Unknown $self->{type} option '$option'"}
00534     }
00535   } else {
00536     foreach my $option (@{$block->{options}}) {
00537       if (!defined($block->{$option})) {
00538     if (!ref($options)) {
00539       my ($value,$error) = PGML::Eval($options);
00540       $options = $value unless $error; ### should give warning? only evaluate some options?
00541     }
00542     $block->{$option} = $options;
00543     return;
00544       }
00545     }
00546     PGML::Warning "Error: extra option '$options'";
00547   }
00548 }
00549 
00550 sub StarOption {
00551   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00552   my $top = $self->{block}->topItem;
00553   if ($token eq '**' && $top->{allowDblStar}) {
00554     $self->{block}->popItem;
00555     my $string;
00556     for ($top->{type}) {
00557       /variable/ && do {$string = $self->replaceVariable($top); last;};
00558       /command/  && do {$string = $self->replaceCommand($top); last;};
00559       PGML::Warning "Unexpected type '$top->{type}' in ".ref($self)."->Star";
00560     }
00561     my @split = $self->Split($string);
00562     push(@split,undef) if scalar(@split) % 2 == 1;
00563     splice(@{$self->{split}},$self->{i},0,@split);
00564     return 1;
00565   }
00566   if ($token eq '*' && $top->{allowStar}) {
00567     $top->{hasStar} = 1;
00568     return 1;
00569 }
00570   return 0;
00571 }
00572 
00573 sub stackString {
00574   my $self = shift; my $block = $self->{block};
00575   my @strings = ();
00576   foreach my $item (@{$block->{stack}}) {
00577     for ($item->{type}) {
00578       /text/     && do {push(@strings,$self->replaceText($item)); last};
00579       /quote/    && do {push(@strings,$self->replaceQuote($item)); last};
00580       /variable/ && do {push(@strings,$self->replaceVariable($item)); last};
00581       /command/  && do {push(@strings,$self->replaceCommand($item)); last};
00582       PGML::Warning "Warning: unexpected type '$item->{type}' in stackString\n";
00583     }
00584   }
00585   return join('',@strings);
00586 }
00587 
00588 sub replaceText {
00589   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
00590   return join('',@{$item->{stack}});
00591 }
00592 
00593 sub replaceQuote {
00594   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
00595   return $item->{token};
00596 }
00597 
00598 sub replaceVariable {
00599   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
00600   my $block = $self->{block};
00601   my $var = "\$main::" . $item->{text};
00602   ### check $var for whether it looks like a variable reference
00603   my ($result,$error) = PGML::Eval($var);
00604   PGML::Warning "Error evaluating variable \$$item->{text}: $error" if $error;
00605   $result = "" unless defined $result;
00606   if ($block->{type} eq 'math' && Value::isValue($result)) {
00607     if ($block->{parsed}) {$result = $result->string} else {$result = '{'.$result->TeX.'}'}
00608   }
00609   return $result;
00610 }
00611 
00612 sub replaceCommand {
00613   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
00614   my $cmd = $item->{text};
00615   my ($result,$error) = PGML::Eval($cmd);
00616   PGML::Warning "Error evaluating command: $error" if $error;
00617   $result = "" unless defined $result;
00618   return $result;
00619 }
00620 
00621 ######################################################################
00622 ######################################################################
00623 
00624 package PGML::Item;
00625 
00626 sub new {
00627   my $self = shift; my $class = ref($self) || $self;
00628   my $type = shift; my $fields = shift || {};
00629   bless {type => $type, %$fields}, $class;
00630 }
00631 
00632 sub show {
00633   my $self = shift; my $indent = shift || "";
00634   my @strings = ();
00635   foreach my $id (PGML::Sort(keys %$self)) {
00636     next if $id eq "stack";
00637     if (ref($self->{$id}) eq 'ARRAY') {
00638       push(@strings,$indent.$id.": [".join(',',map {"'".$self->quote($_)."'"} @{$self->{$id}})."]");
00639     } else {
00640       push(@strings,$indent.$id.": '".$self->quote($self->{$id})."'");
00641     }
00642   }
00643   return join("\n",@strings);
00644 }
00645 
00646 sub quote {
00647   my $self = shift;
00648   my $string = shift;
00649   $string =~ s/\n/\\n/g;
00650   $string =~ s/\t/\\t/g;
00651   return $string;
00652 }
00653 
00654 ######################################################################
00655 
00656 package PGML::Block;
00657 our @ISA = ('PGML::Item');
00658 
00659 sub new {
00660   my $self = shift; my $type = shift; my $fields = shift || {};
00661   $self->SUPER::new($type, {
00662     %$fields,
00663     stack => [],
00664   });
00665 }
00666 
00667 sub pushText {
00668   my $self = shift; my $text = shift; my $force = shift;
00669   return if $text eq "" && !$force;
00670   my $top = $self->topItem;
00671   if ($top->{type} ne "text") {$self->pushItem(PGML::Text->new($text))}
00672                          else {$top->pushText($text)}
00673 }
00674 
00675 sub pushItem {
00676   my $self = shift;
00677   push(@{$self->{stack}},@_);
00678 }
00679 
00680 sub topItem {
00681   my $self = shift; my $i = shift || -1;
00682   return $self->{stack}[$i] || PGML::Block->new("null");
00683 }
00684 
00685 sub popItem {
00686   my $self = shift;
00687   pop(@{$self->{stack}});
00688 }
00689 
00690 sub combineTopItems {
00691   my $self = shift; my $i = shift; $i = -1 unless defined $i;
00692   my $top = $self->topItem($i); my $prev = $self->topItem($i-1); my $par;
00693   if ($prev->{type} eq 'par' && $top->{combine}{par}) {$par = $prev; $prev = $self->topItem($i-2)}
00694   my $id = $top->{combine}{$prev->{type}}; my $value; my $inside = 0;
00695   if ($id) {
00696     if (ref($id) eq 'HASH') {($id,$value) = %$id; $inside = 1} else {$value = $prev->{$id}}
00697     if ($top->{$id} eq $value) {
00698       #
00699       #  Combine identical blocks
00700       #
00701       $prev = $prev->topItem if $inside;
00702       splice(@{$self->{stack}},$i,1);
00703       if ($par) {splice(@{$self->{stack}},$i,1); $prev->pushItem($par)}
00704       $i = -scalar(@{$top->{stack}});
00705       $prev->pushItem(@{$top->{stack}});
00706       $prev->combineTopItems($i) if $prev->{type} ne 'text' && $prev->topItem($i)->{combine};
00707       return;
00708     } elsif ($top->{type} eq 'indent' & $prev->{type} eq 'indent' &&
00709          $top->{indent} > $prev->{indent} && $prev->{indent} > 0) {
00710       #
00711       #  Move larger indentations into smaller ones
00712       #
00713       splice(@{$self->{stack}},$i,1);
00714       if ($par) {splice(@{$self->{stack}},$i,1); $prev->pushItem($par)}
00715       $top->{indent} -= $prev->{indent};
00716       $prev->pushItem($top);
00717       $prev->combineTopItems;
00718       return;
00719     }
00720   }
00721 return;
00722   #
00723   #  Remove unneeded zero indents
00724   #
00725   if ($top->{type} eq 'indent' && $top->{indent} == 0) {
00726     splice(@{$self->{stack}},$i,1,@{$top->{stack}});
00727     $top = $self->topItem($i);
00728     $self->combineTopItems($i) if $top->{combine};
00729   }
00730 }
00731 
00732 sub show {
00733   my $self = shift; my $indent = shift || "";
00734   my @strings = ($self->SUPER::show($indent));
00735   if ($self->{stack}) {
00736     push(@strings,$indent."stack: [");
00737     foreach my $i (0..scalar(@{$self->{stack}})-1) {
00738       my $item = $self->{stack}[$i];
00739       if (ref($item)) {
00740     push(@strings,"$indent  [ # $i");
00741     push(@strings,$item->show($indent."    "));
00742     push(@strings,"$indent  ]");
00743       } else {
00744     push(@strings,"$indent  $i: '$item',");
00745       }
00746     }
00747     push(@strings,$indent."]");
00748   }
00749   return join("\n",@strings);
00750 }
00751 
00752 ######################################################################
00753 
00754 package PGML::Root;
00755 our @ISA = ('PGML::Block');
00756 
00757 sub new {
00758   my $self = shift; my $parser = shift;
00759   return $self->SUPER::new("root",{parseAll => 1, parser => $parser});
00760 }
00761 
00762 sub pushItem {
00763   my $self = shift; my $item;
00764   while ($item = shift) {
00765     my $parser = $self->{parser};
00766     if (!$item->{noIndent} || ($parser->{indent} && $item->{noIndent} < 0)) {
00767       $parser->{block} = PGML::Block->new("indent",{
00768      prev => $self, indent => $parser->{indent}, parseAll => 1,
00769      combine => {indent => "indent", list => {indent => 1}, par => 1}
00770       });
00771       $parser->{block}->pushItem($item,@_); @_ = ();
00772       $item = $parser->{block};
00773     }
00774     push(@{$self->{stack}},$item);
00775   }
00776 }
00777 
00778 
00779 ######################################################################
00780 ######################################################################
00781 
00782 package PGML::Text;
00783 our @ISA = ('PGML::Item');
00784 
00785 sub new {
00786   my $self = shift;
00787   $self->SUPER::new("text",{stack=>[@_], combine => {text => "type"}});
00788     }
00789 
00790 sub pushText {
00791   my $self = shift;
00792   foreach my $text (@_) {push(@{$self->{stack}},$text) if $text ne ""}
00793   }
00794 
00795 sub pushItem {
00796   my $self = shift;
00797   $self->pushText(@_);
00798 }
00799 
00800 sub show {
00801   my $self = shift; my $indent = shift;
00802   my @strings = ($self->SUPER::show($indent));
00803   push(@strings,$indent."stack: ['".join("','",map {$self->quote($_)} @{$self->{stack}})."']");
00804   return join("\n",@strings);
00805   }

00807 ######################################################################
00808 ######################################################################
00809 
00810 package PGML::Format;
00811 
00812 sub new {
00813   my $self = shift; my $class = ref($self) || $self;
00814   my $parser = shift;
00815   bless {parser => $parser}, $class;
00816   }
00817 
00818 sub format {
00819   my $self = shift;
00820   return $self->string($self->{parser}{root});
00821 }
00822 
00823 sub string {
00824   my $self = shift; my $block = shift;
00825   my @strings = (); my $string;
00826   foreach my $item (@{$block->{stack}}) {
00827     $self->{item} = $item;
00828     $self->{nl} = (!defined($strings[-1]) || $strings[-1] =~ m/\n$/ ? "" : "\n");
00829 # warn "type: $item->{type}";
00830     for ($item->{type}) {
00831       /indent/   && do {$string = $self->Indent($item); last};
00832       /align/    && do {$string = $self->Align($item); last};
00833       /par/      && do {$string = $self->Par($item); last};
00834       /list/     && do {$string = $self->List($item); last};
00835       /bullet/   && do {$string = $self->Bullet($item); last};
00836       /text/     && do {$string = $self->Text($item); last};
00837       /variable/ && do {$string = $self->Variable($item,$block); last};
00838       /command/  && do {$string = $self->Command($item); last};
00839       /math/     && do {$string = $self->Math($item); last};
00840       /answer/   && do {$string = $self->Answer($item); last};
00841       /bold/     && do {$string = $self->Bold($item); last};
00842       /italic/   && do {$string = $self->Italic($item); last};
00843       /heading/  && do {$string = $self->Heading($item); last};
00844       /quote/    && do {$string = $self->Quote($item,$strings[-1] || ''); last};
00845       /rule/     && do {$string = $self->Rule($item); last};
00846       /pre/      && do {$string = $self->Pre($item); last};
00847       /verbatim/ && do {$string = $self->Verbatim($item); last};
00848       /break/    && do {$string = $self->Break($item); last};
00849       /forced/   && do {$string = $self->Forced($item); last};
00850       /comment/  && do {$string = $self->Comment($item); last};
00851       PGML::Warning "Warning: unknown block type '$item->{type}' in ".ref($self)."::format\n";
00852     }
00853     push(@strings,$string) unless $string eq '';
00854   }
00855   $self->{nl} = (!defined($strings[-1]) || $strings[-1] =~ m/\n$/ ? "" : "\n");
00856   return join('',@strings);
00857 }
00858 
00859 sub nl {
00860   my $self = shift;
00861   my $nl = $self->{nl}; $self->{nl} = "";
00862   return $nl;
00863 }
00864 
00865 sub Escape   {shift; shift}
00866 
00867 
00868 sub Indent   {return ""}
00869 sub Align    {return ""}
00870 sub Par      {return ""}
00871 sub List     {return ""}
00872 sub Bullet   {return ""}
00873 sub Bold     {return ""}
00874 sub Italic   {return ""}
00875 sub Heading  {return ""}
00876 sub Quote    {return ""}
00877 sub Rule     {return ""}
00878 sub Pre      {return ""}
00879 sub Verbatim {return ""}
00880 sub Break    {return ""}
00881 sub Forced   {return ""}
00882 sub Comment  {return ""}
00883 
00884 sub Math {
00885   my $self = shift; my $item = shift; my $math = $item->{text};
00886   if ($item->{parsed}) {
00887     my $context = $main::context{Typeset};
00888     $context = $main::context{current} if $item->{hasStar};
00889     if ($item->{context}) {
00890       if (Value::isContext($item->{context})) {$context = $item->{context}}
00891       else {$context = Parser::Context->getCopy(undef,$item->{context})}
00892     }
00893     $context->clearError;
00894     my $obj = Parser::Formula($context,$math);
00895     if ($context->{error}{flag}) {
00896       PGML::Warning "Error parsing mathematics: $context->{error}{message}";
00897       return "(math error)";
00898     }
00899     $math = $obj->TeX;
00900   }
00901   $math = "\\displaystyle{$math}" if $item->{display};
00902   return $math;
00903 }
00904 
00905 sub Answer {
00906   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
00907   my $ans = $item->{answer};
00908   $item->{width} = length($item->{token})-2 if (!defined($item->{width}));
00909   if (defined($ans)) {
00910     if (ref($ans) =~ /CODE|AnswerEvaluator/) {
00911       if (defined($item->{name})) {
00912     main::NAMED_ANS($item->{name} => $ans);
00913     return main::NAMED_ANS_RULE($item->{name},$item->{width});
00914       } else {
00915     main::ANS($ans);
00916     return main::ans_rule($item->{width});
00917       }
00918     }
00919     unless (Value::isValue($ans)) {
00920       $ans = Parser::Formula($item->{answer});
00921       if (defined($ans)) {
00922     $ans = $ans->eval if $ans->isConstant;
00923     $ans->{correct_ans} = "$item->{answer}";
00924     $item->{answer} = $ans;
00925       } else {
00926     PGML::Warning "Error parsing answer: ".Value->context->{error}{message};
00927     $ans = main::String("");  ### use something else?
00928       }
00929     }
00930     my @options = ($item->{width});
00931     my $method = ($item->{hasStar} ? "ans_array" : "ans_rule");
00932     if ($item->{name}) {
00933       unshift(@options,$item->{name});
00934       $method = "named_".$method;
00935     }
00936     main::ANS($ans->cmp) unless ref($ans) eq 'MultiAnswer' && $ans->{part} > 1;
00937     if ($item->{hasStar}) {
00938       my $output = $ans->$method(@options);
00939       $output =~ s!\\!\\\\!g;
00940       return main::EV3($output);
00941     } else {return $ans->$method(@options)}
00942   } else {
00943     return main::NAMED_ANS_RULE($item->{name},$item->{width}) if defined $item->{name};
00944     return main::ans_rule($item->{width});
00945   }
00946 }
00947 
00948 sub Command {
00949   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
00950   my $text = $self->{parser}->replaceCommand($item);
00951   $text = $self->Escape($text) unless $item->{hasStar};
00952   return $text;
00953 }
00954 
00955 sub Variable {
00956   my $self = shift; my $item = shift; my $cur = shift;
00957   my $text = $self->{parser}->replaceVariable($item,$cur);
00958   $text = $self->Escape($text) unless $item->{hasStar};
00959   return $text;
00960 }
00961 
00962 sub Text {
00963   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
00964   my $text = $self->{parser}->replaceText($item);
00965   $text =~ s/^\n+// if substr($text,0,1) eq "\n" && $self->nl eq "";
00966   return $self->Escape($text);
00967 }
00968 
00969 ######################################################################
00970 ######################################################################
00971 
00972 package PGML::Format::html;
00973 our @ISA = ('PGML::Format');
00974 
00975 sub Escape {
00976   my $self = shift;
00977   my $string = shift; return "" unless defined $string;
00978   $string =~ s/&/\&amp;/g;
00979   $string =~ s/</&lt;/g;
00980   $string =~ s/>/&gt;/g;
00981   $string =~ s/"/&quot;/g;
00982   return $string;
00983 }
00984 
00985 sub Indent {
00986   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
00987   return $self->string($item) if $item->{indent} == 0;
00988   my $em = 2.25 * $item->{indent};
00989   return
00990     $self->nl .
00991     '<div style="margin:0 0 0 '.$em.'em">'."\n" .
00992     $self->string($item) .
00993     $self->nl .
00994     "</div>\n";
00995 }
00996 
00997 sub Align {
00998   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
00999   return
01000     $self->nl .
01001     '<div style="text-align:'.$item->{align}.'; margin:0">'."\n" .
01002     $self->string($item) .
01003     $self->nl .
01004     "</div>\n";
01005 }
01006 
01007 my %bullet = (
01008   bullet  => 'ul',
01009   numeric => 'ol',
01010   alpha   => 'ol type="a"',
01011   Alpha   => 'ol type="A"',
01012   roman   => 'ol type="i"',
01013   Roman   => 'ol type="I"',
01014   circle  => 'ul type="circle"',
01015   square  => 'ul type="square"',
01016 );
01017 sub List {
01018   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01019   my $list = $bullet{$item->{bullet}};
01020   return
01021     $self->nl .
01022     '<'.$list.' style="margin:0; padding-left:2.25em">'."\n" .
01023     $self->string($item) .
01024     $self->nl .
01025     "</".substr($list,0,2).">\n";
01026 }
01027 
01028 sub Bullet {
01029   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01030   return $self->nl.'<li>'.$self->string($item)."</li>\n";
01031 }
01032 
01033 sub Pre {
01034   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01035   return
01036     $self->nl .
01037     '<pre style="margin:0"><code>' .
01038     $self->string($item) .
01039     "</code></pre>\n";
01040 }
01041 
01042 sub Heading {
01043   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01044   my $n = $item->{n};
01045   my $text = $self->string($item);
01046   $text =~ s/^ +| +$//gm; $text =~ s! +(<br />)!$1!g;
01047   return '<h'.$n.' style="margin:0">'.$text."</h$n>\n";
01048 }
01049 
01050 sub Par {
01051   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01052   return $self->nl.'<p style="margin-bottom:0">'."\n"
01053 }
01054 
01055 sub Break {"<br />\n"}
01056 
01057 sub Bold {
01058   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01059   return '<b>'.$self->string($item).'</b>';
01060 }
01061 
01062 sub Italic {
01063   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01064   return '<i>'.$self->string($item).'</i>';
01065 }
01066 
01067 my %openQuote = ('"' => "&#x201C;", "'" => "&#x2018;");
01068 my %closeQuote = ('"' => "&#x201D;", "'" => "&#x2019;");
01069 sub Quote {
01070   my $self = shift; my $item = shift; my $string = shift;
01071   return $openQuote{$item->{token}} if $string eq "" || $string =~ m/(^|[ ({\[\s])$/;
01072   return $closeQuote{$item->{token}};
01073 }
01074 
01075 sub Rule {
01076   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01077   my $width = " width:100%; "; my $size = "";
01078   $width = ' width:'.$item->{width}.'; ' if defined $item->{width};
01079   $size = ' size="'.$item->{size}.'"' if defined $item->{size};
01080   my $html = '<hr'.$size.' style="margin:.3em auto" />';
01081   $html = '<div>'.
01082           '<span style="'.$width.'display:-moz-inline-box; display:inline-block; margin:.3em auto">'.
01083              $html.
01084           '</span>'.
01085           '</div>'; # if $width ne '' && $item->{width} !~ m/%/;
01086   return $self->nl.$html."\n";
01087 }
01088 
01089 sub Verbatim {
01090   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01091   my $text = $self->Escape($item->{text});
01092   $text = "<code>$text</code>" if $item->{hasStar};
01093   return $text;
01094 }
01095 
01096 sub Math {
01097   my $self = shift;
01098   return main::math_ev3($self->SUPER::Math(@_));
01099 }
01100 
01101 ######################################################################
01102 ######################################################################
01103 
01104 package PGML::Format::tex;
01105 our @ISA = ('PGML::Format');
01106 
01107 my %escape = (
01108   '"'  => '{\ttfamily\char34}',
01109   "\#" => '{\ttfamily\char35}',
01110   '$'  => '\$',
01111   '%'  => '\%',
01112   '&'  => '\&',
01113   '<'  => '{\ttfamily\char60}',
01114   '>'  => '{\ttfamily\char62}',
01115   '\\' => '{\ttfamily\char92}',
01116   '^'  => '{\ttfamily\char94}',
01117   '_'  => '\_',
01118   '{'  => '{\ttfamily\char123}',
01119   '|'  => '{\ttfamily\char124}',
01120   '}'  => '{\ttfamily\char125}',
01121   '~'  => '{\ttfamily\char126}',
01122 );
01123 
01124 sub Escape {
01125   my $self = shift;
01126   my $string = shift; return "" unless defined($string);
01127   $string =~ s/(["\#\$%&<>\\^_\{|\}~])/$escape{$1}/eg;
01128   return $string;
01129 }
01130 
01131 sub Indent {
01132   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01133   return $self->string($item) if $item->{indent} == 0;
01134   my $em = 2.25 * $item->{indent};
01135   return
01136     $self->nl .
01137     "{\\pgmlIndent\n" .
01138     $self->string($item) .
01139     $self->nl .
01140     "\\par}%\n";
01141 }
01142 
01143 sub Align {
01144   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01145   my $align = uc(substr($item->{align},0,1)).substr($item->{align},1);
01146   return
01147     $self->nl .
01148     "{\\pgml${align}{}" .
01149     $self->string($item) .
01150     $self->nl .
01151     "\\par}%\n";
01152 }
01153 
01154 sub List {
01155   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01156   return
01157     $self->nl .
01158     "{\\pgmlIndent\\let\\pgmlItem=\\pgml$item->{bullet}Item\n".
01159     $self->string($item) .
01160     $self->nl .
01161     "\\par}%\n";
01162 }
01163 
01164 sub Bullet {
01165   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01166   return $self->nl."\\pgmlItem{}".$self->string($item)."\n";
01167 }
01168 
01169 sub Pre {
01170   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01171   return
01172     $self->nl .
01173     "{\\pgmlPreformatted%\n" .
01174     $self->string($item) .
01175     "\\par}%\n";
01176 }
01177 
01178 sub Heading {
01179   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01180   my $n = $item->{n};
01181   my $text = $self->string($item);
01182   $text =~ s/^ +| +$//gm; $text =~ s/ +(\\pgmlBreak)/$1/g;
01183   return "{\\pgmlHeading{$n}$text\\par}%\n";
01184 }
01185 
01186 sub Par {
01187   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01188   return $self->nl."\\vskip\\baselineskip\n";
01189 }
01190 
01191 sub Break {"\\pgmlBreak\n"}
01192 
01193 sub Bold {
01194   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01195   return "{\\bfseries{}".$self->string($item)."}";
01196 }
01197 
01198 sub Italic {
01199   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01200   return "{\\itshape{}".$self->string($item)."}";
01201 }
01202 
01203 my %openQuote = ('"' => "``", "'" => "`");
01204 my %closeQuote = ('"' => "''", "'" => "'");
01205 sub Quote {
01206   my $self = shift; my $item = shift; my $string = shift;
01207   return $openQuote{$item->{token}} if $string eq "" || $string =~ m/(^|[ ({\[\s])$/;
01208   return $closeQuote{$item->{token}};
01209 }
01210 
01211 sub Rule {
01212   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01213   my $width = "100%"; my $size = "1";
01214   $width = $item->{width} if defined $item->{width};
01215   $size = $item->{size} if defined $item->{size};
01216   $width =~ s/%/\\pgmlPercent/; $size =~ s/%/\\pgmlPercent/;
01217   $width .= "\\pgmlPixels" if $width =~ m/^\d+$/;
01218   $size .= "\\pgmlPixels" if $size =~ m/^\d+$/;
01219   return $self->nl."\\pgmlRule{$width}{$size}%\n";
01220 }
01221 
01222 sub Verbatim {
01223   my $self = shift; my $item = shift;
01224   my $text = $self->Escape($item->{text});
01225   $text = "{\\tt{}$text}" if $item->{hasStar};
01226   return $text;
01227 }
01228 
01229 sub Math {
01230   my $self = shift;
01231   return "\$".$self->SUPER::Math(@_)."\$";
01232 }
01233 
01234 ######################################################################
01235 ######################################################################
01236 
01237 package PGML;
01238 
01239 sub Format {
01240   ClearWarnings;
01241   my $parser = PGML::Parse->new(shift);
01242   my $format;
01243   if ($main::displayMode eq 'TeX') {
01244     $format = "{\\pgmlSetup\n".PGML::Format::tex->new($parser)->format."\\par}%\n";
01245   } else {
01246     $format = '<div class="PGML">'."\n".PGML::Format::html->new($parser)->format.'</div>'."\n";
01247   }
01248   warn join("\n","==================","Errors parsing PGML:",@warnings,"==================\n") if scalar(@warnings);
01249   return $format;
01250 }
01251 
01252 sub Format2 {
01253   my $string = shift;
01254   $string =~ s/\\\\/\\/g;
01255   PGML::Format($string);
01256 }
01257 
01258 ######################################################################
01259 #
01260 #  TeX code needed for PGML in hardcopy
01261 #
01262 
01263 our $preamble = <<'END_PREAMBLE';
01264 \ifdim\lastskip=\pgmlMarker
01265   \let\pgmlPar=\relax
01266  \else
01267   \let\pgmlPar=\par
01268   \vadjust{\kern3pt}%
01269 \fi
01270 
01271 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
01272 %
01273 %    definitions for PGML
01274 %
01275 
01276 \ifx\pgmlCount\undefined  % don not redefine if multiple files load PGML.pl
01277   \newcount\pgmlCount
01278   \newdimen\pgmlPercent
01279   \newdimen\pgmlPixels  \pgmlPixels=.5pt
01280 \fi
01281 \pgmlPercent=.01\hsize
01282 
01283 \def\pgmlSetup{%
01284   \parskip=0pt \parindent=0pt
01285 %  \ifdim\lastskip=\pgmlMarker\else\par\fi
01286   \pgmlPar
01287 }%
01288 
01289 \def\pgmlIndent{\par\advance\leftskip by 2em \advance\pgmlPercent by .02em \pgmlCount=0}%
01290 \def\pgmlbulletItem{\par\indent\llap{$\bullet$ }\ignorespaces}%
01291 \def\pgmlcircleItem{\par\indent\llap{$\circ$ }\ignorespaces}%
01292 \def\pgmlsquareItem{\par\indent\llap{\vrule height 1ex width .75ex depth -.25ex\ }\ignorespaces}%
01293 \def\pgmlnumericItem{\par\indent\advance\pgmlCount by 1 \llap{\the\pgmlCount. }\ignorespaces}%
01294 \def\pgmlalphaItem{\par\indent{\advance\pgmlCount by `\a \llap{\char\pgmlCount. }}\advance\pgmlCount by 1\ignorespaces}%
01295 \def\pgmlAlphaItem{\par\indent{\advance\pgmlCount by `\A \llap{\char\pgmlCount. }}\advance\pgmlCount by 1\ignorespaces}%
01296 \def\pgmlromanItem{\par\indent\advance\pgmlCount by 1 \llap{\romannumeral\pgmlCount. }\ignorespaces}%
01297 \def\pgmlRomanItem{\par\indent\advance\pgmlCount by 1 \llap{\uppercase\expandafter{\romannumeral\pgmlCount}. }\ignorespaces}%
01298 
01299 \def\pgmlCenter{%
01300   \par \parfillskip=0pt
01301   \advance\leftskip by 0pt plus .5\hsize
01302   \advance\rightskip by 0pt plus .5\hsize
01303   \def\pgmlBreak{\break}%
01304 }%
01305 \def\pgmlRight{%
01306   \par \parfillskip=0pt
01307   \advance\leftskip by 0pt plus \hsize
01308   \def\pgmlBreak{\break}%
01309 }%
01310 
01311 \def\pgmlBreak{\\}%
01312 
01313 \def\pgmlHeading#1{%
01314   \par\bfseries
01315   \ifcase#1 \or\huge \or\LARGE \or\large \or\normalsize \or\footnotesize \or\scriptsize \fi
01316 }%
01317 
01318 \def\pgmlRule#1#2{%
01319   \par\noindent
01320   \hbox{%
01321     \strut%
01322     \dimen1=\ht\strutbox%
01323     \advance\dimen1 by -#2%
01324     \divide\dimen1 by 2%
01325     \advance\dimen2 by -\dp\strutbox%
01326     \raise\dimen1\hbox{\vrule width #1 height #2 depth 0pt}%
01327   }%
01328   \par
01329 }%
01330 
01331 \def\pgmlIC#1{\futurelet\pgmlNext\pgmlCheckIC}%
01332 \def\pgmlCheckIC{\ifx\pgmlNext\pgmlSpace \/\fi}%
01333 {\def\getSpace#1{\global\let\pgmlSpace= }\getSpace{} }%
01334 
01335 {\catcode`\ =12\global\let\pgmlSpaceChar= }%
01336 {\obeylines\gdef\pgmlPreformatted{\par\small\ttfamily\hsize=10\hsize\obeyspaces\obeylines\let^^M=\pgmlNL\pgmlNL}}%
01337 \def\pgmlNL{\par\bgroup\catcode`\ =12\pgmlTestSpace}%
01338 \def\pgmlTestSpace{\futurelet\next\pgmlTestChar}%
01339 \def\pgmlTestChar{\ifx\next\pgmlSpaceChar\ \pgmlTestNext\fi\egroup}%
01340 \def\pgmlTestNext\fi\egroup#1{\fi\pgmlTestSpace}%
01341 
01342 \def^^M{\ifmmode\else\space\fi\ignorespaces}%
01343 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
01344 END_PREAMBLE
01345 
01346 ######################################################################
01347 
01348 package main;
01349 
01350 sub _PGML_init {
01351   $problemPreamble->{TeX} .= $PGML::preamble unless $problemPreamble->{TeX} =~ m/definitions for PGML/;
01352   if (defined($BR)) {
01353     ## Avoid bad spacing at the top of the problem (need to modify hardcopyPreamble.tex)
01354     TEXT(MODES(HTML=>'', TeX=>'
01355       \ifx\pgmlMarker\undefined
01356         \newdimen\pgmlMarker \pgmlMarker=0.00314159pt  % hack to lett if \newline was used
01357       \fi
01358       \ifx\oldnewline\undefined \let\oldnewline=\newline \fi
01359       \def\newline{\oldnewline\hskip-\pgmlMarker\hskip\pgmlMarker\relax}%
01360       \parindent=0pt
01361       \catcode`\^^M=\active
01362       \def^^M{\ifmmode\else\fi\ignorespaces}%  skip paragraph breaks in the preamble
01363       \def\par{\ifmmode\else\endgraf\fi\ignorespaces}%
01364     '));
01365   }
01366   if (!defined($BR)) {PGML::Eval("sub lex_sort {return sort(\@_)}")}  # hack to be able to run this on the command line
01367 }
